overview: "Re-Invention World Tour" was the sixth concert tour by Madonna. It supported her ninth studio album "American Life".  The final show in Lisbon was expected to air on CBS, who had allegedly offered to pay $10 million to broadcast it as a two-hour special, and after it would be released on DVD as "Get Up Lisboa! - The Re-Invention World Tour", but did not happen. In early 2010, the tour's professional recording was completely leaked on the internet.
title: Madonna: Re-Invention World Tour
